MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH4 postcode area of Bretton, affecting properties in Broughton Mills Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:05AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of extensive repairs required. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:47PM on 21st January 2021.
